LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.0.label: latent psionic energy
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.0.description: I can feel traces of psionic energy here and they tickle my mind.
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.1.label: weak psionic energy
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.1.description: It isn't strong, but I can draw on the psionic field around me.
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.2.label: moderate psionic energy
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.2.description: I can draw on the psionic field around me, my mind feels open.
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.3.label: strong psionic energy
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.3.description: This psionic field is expanding my consciousness.
LanguageData.PsionicFieldMood.stages.4.label: extreme psionic energy
LanguageData.AteRawFoodCrystalloid.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFoodCrystalloid.stages.0.descripti: I had to consume raw food. I would rather it be cooked...
LanguageData.AteRawFoodValkyrie.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFoodValkyrie.stages.0.description: I ate raw meat, it was pretty good.
LanguageData.AteKibbleCrystalloid.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AteKibbleCrystalloid.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat animal kibble, I feel so degraded.
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.0.label: hungry
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.1.label: urgently hungry
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.1.description: These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.2.label: starving (trivial)
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.2.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus.
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.3.label: starving (minor)
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.3.description: I can feel my body wasting away. I can't go on like this.
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.4.label: starving (moderate)
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.4.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin feels brittle and weak. Am I going to die?
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.5.label: starving (severe)
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.5.description: I can barely move or think about anything but food. I can't handle this, I feel like I'm going to pass out.
LanguageData.NeedFoodCrystalloid.stages.6.label: starving (extreme)
This strange device reminds me of peaceful days.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.0.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.0.descrip: It's like a calming voice calling out to me, peacefully.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.1.label: low psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.1.descrip: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. The collective's punishment is clawing at me.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.2.label: moderate psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.2.descrip: They want me, they hate me, they are searching for me and poisoning my mind with their ire. Leave me alone!
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.3.label: high psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.3.descrip: The voice of the collective is unbearably loud, they see me... they see me.....
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.4.label: extreme psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDroneCrystalloid.stages.4.descrip: I am being watched, a million eyes gazing down at me with hate.
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.0.label: hideous environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.0.descripti: What a disgusting dump this place is...
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.1.label: very ugly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.1.descripti: This place really bothers me, I want to leave.
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.2.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.2.descripti: This place is unpleasant to be in.
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.3.label: pleasant environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.4.label: very pleasant environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.4.descripti: I really like this place. It's beautiful.
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.5.label: beautiful environment
LanguageData.NeedBeautyCrystalloid.stages.5.descripti: I am pleased to see we have such a luxuriously beautiful place.
LanguageData.SleptInColdCrystalloid.stages.0.label: slept in the cold
LanguageData.SleptInColdCrystalloid.stages.0.descript: Sleeping in the cold is a very unpleasant experience without much body heat. We really need some heaters.
LanguageData.SleptInHeatCrystalloid.stages.0.label: slept in the heat
LanguageData.SleptInHeatCrystalloid.stages.0.descript: I had to sleep in the heat, my body reacts poorly to that.. Can't we have air conditioning?
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdCrystalloid.stages.0.desc: My body doesn't handle the cold well.
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdCrystalloid.stages.1.desc: I'm so cold. My head aches. Can't get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdCrystalloid.stages.2.desc: I have an intense headache from the cold, I need to get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.0.label: hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.1.label: very hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.2.label: extremely hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.2.descr: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.3.label: burning up
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotCrystalloid.stages.3.descr: I'm burning up, my flesh is drying out. I think I could die from this heat!
LanguageData.NakedCrystalloid.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.NakedCrystalloid.stages.0.description: I am stripped of my dignity.
LanguageData.SleptOutsideCrystalloid.stages.0.label: slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutsideCrystalloid.stages.0.descrip: I had to sleep outdoors in the filth...
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimismCrystalloid.stages.0.de: We just landed here. It's a tough situation, and I am a bit paranoid, but I'm excited to be founding a new colony.
